## How to connect to SigRepo database

1. Load packages

```{r pkgs}
library(RMySQL)
library(DBI)
```

2. Connect to Sigrepo database using RMySQL driver

```{r connection}
conn <- DBI::dbConnect(
  drv = RMySQL::MySQL(),
  dbname = "sigrepo",
  host = "montilab.bu.edu",
  port = 3306,
  username = "guest",
  password = "guest"
)
```

3. See connection information

```{r info}
conn_info <- DBI::dbGetInfo(conn)
conn_info
```
